name: ExperienceInviteOptions
type: class
memorycategory: Instances
summary: |
  Used to customize a player invite prompt.
description: |
  Used to customize a
  player invite prompt, such
  as to customize the prompt message, target a specific connection, or include
  launch data in the invite.
codesamples: []
inherits:
  - Instance
descendants: []
tags:
  - NotReplicated
deprecationmessage: ''
properties:
  - name: ExperienceInviteOptions.InviteMessageId
    summary: |
      Asset ID that maps to a Notification asset type.
    description: |
      Asset ID that maps to a Notification asset type. This asset is used to
      store/localize a custom string for the invite notification that
      connections receive. See
      Setting Notification Options
      for details.
    codesamples: []
    type: string
    tags: []
    deprecationmessage: ''
    security:
      read: None
      write: None
    threadsafety: ReadSafe
    category: Data
    serialization:
      canload: true
      cansave: true
    capabilities:
      - Social
  - name: ExperienceInviteOptions.InviteUser
    summary: |
      Roblox Class.Player.UserId|UserId of the specific connection to invite.
    description: |
      Roblox Class.Player.UserId|UserId of the specific connection to invite;
      if not provided, the player will be prompted to pick from a list of
      connections.
    codesamples: []
    type: int64
    tags: []
    deprecationmessage: ''
    security:
      read: None
      write: None
    threadsafety: ReadSafe
    category: Data
    serialization:
      canload: true
      cansave: true
    capabilities:
      - Social
  - name: ExperienceInviteOptions.LaunchData
    summary: |
      Used to set a parameter in Class.Player:GetJoinData() when a connection
      joins from the invite notification.
    description: |
      Used to set a parameter in Class.Player:GetJoinData() when a connection
      joins from the invite notification; maximum of 200 characters. See
      Include launch data
      for a usage example.
    codesamples: []
    type: string
    tags: []
    deprecationmessage: ''
    security:
      read: None
      write: None
    threadsafety: ReadSafe
    category: Data
    serialization:
      canload: true
      cansave: true
    capabilities:
      - Social
  - name: ExperienceInviteOptions.PromptMessage
    summary: |
      Custom text shown on the invite prompt for the sending player.
    description: |
      Custom text shown on the invite prompt for the sending player, for example
      "Ask your connections to join the adventure!" for a multi-connection
      invite prompt, or "Invite this connection to join the adventure!" for a
      specific connection invite prompt.
    codesamples: []
    type: string
    tags: []
    deprecationmessage: ''
    security:
      read: None
      write: None
    threadsafety: ReadSafe
    category: Data
    serialization:
      canload: true
      cansave: true
    capabilities:
      - Social
